directive_ref: CEO DIRECTIVE WAVE 15/15A - AUTONOMOUS GOLDEN NEEDLE HUNT WITH SOURCE ATTRIBUTION

source_attribution.search_query: (BTC OR ETH OR SOL OR bitcoin OR ethereum OR solana OR altcoin) layer2 breakout trading

sources.snippet_or_excerpt: Learn about the competition between Polygon (MATIC) vs Arbitrum (ARB) and what it means for Ethereum users and developers.
As Bitcoin moves sideways and traders hunt for high-conviction opportunities, two altcoins are quietly gaining momentum: StarkNet...
Arbitrum (ARB), a leading Layer-2 scaling solution for Ethereum, has captured the attention of cryptocurrency analysts and traders alike.
Solana remains one of the strongest Layer 1s in crypto, but even the most loyal holders admit: it's not moving much right now.
Ethereum has stormed past the $4K mark, chalking up an almost 20% gain in just one week. Traders are grinning, chart analysts are sharpening...

hypothesis_content.title: BTC Stability Layer2 Breakout
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC trades in a <3% range for 4 consecutive days while Layer2 tokens (ARB/OP/STRK basket) show increasing relative volume (>1.2x 10-day average), a breakout from the BTC range will trigger outsized Layer2 moves (>2x BTC move) in the same direction.
hypothesis_content.rationale: BTC consolidation periods see capital rotate to altcoins. Increasing Layer2 volume during consolidation indicates accumulation. Breakout from compression triggers leveraged beta plays.
entry_conditions: Layer2 basket volume ratio (vs 10-day avg) >1.2 for 2 consecutive days
BTC breaks 4-day range high or low
Enter Layer2 basket in direction of BTC break on same candle close

exit_conditions.take_profit: Layer2 basket achieves 2:1 ratio vs BTC move (e.g., BTC +5%, Layer2 +10%)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC reverses to opposite side of 4-day range

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: BTC range break fails to sustain or Layer2 volume was deceptive (wash trading).
